articles.description: The first 100-yard rushing game of Clemson fullback Chad Jasmin's career came vs. No. 6 Tennessee in the 2003 Peach Bowl.
articles.content:
With Clemsons Orange Bowl showdown against Tennessee rapidly approaching, forgive Chad Jasmin for pausing for a bit of reflection.
Jasmin was, after all, the Most Valuable Player the last time these… [+3232 chars]
